languages.text: "При проверке одного из миров авгуры предоставили данные о некоей геологической аномалии, не поддающейся адекватному сканированию. Судя по данным, объект похож на... бездонную червоточину. Каких-либо подробностей сообщить не могу — машинные духи авгуров пришли в ярость от нелогичности полученных данных и отказались обрабатывать сведения. Возможно, высадка в зоне аномалии позволит узнать больше".

"When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."
languages.original_text: "При проверке одного из миров авгуры предоставили данные о некоей геологической аномалии, не поддающейся адекватному сканированию. Судя по данным, объект похож на... бездонную червоточину. Каких-либо подробностей сообщить не могу — машинные духи авгуров пришли в ярость от нелогичности полученных данных и отказались обрабатывать сведения. Возможно, высадка в зоне аномалии позволит узнать больше".

According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

languages.text: « En inspectant l'un des mondes, les augures ont détecté une anomalie géologique qui échappe à notre capacité d'analyse. D'après leurs rapports, il s'agirait d'un... trou de ver dénué de fond. Après avoir plongé dans un état proche de la démence face à ces données défiant toute logique, les esprits de la machine ont refusé catégoriquement de les analyser plus en détail. Seul l'envoi d'une équipe au sol nous permettra d'en apprendre davantage. »
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

traits.locale_text: « En inspectant l'un des mondes, les augures ont détecté une anomalie géologique qui échappe à notre capacité d'analyse. D'après leurs rapports, il s'agirait d'un... trou de ver dénué de fond. Après avoir plongé dans un état proche de la démence face à ces données défiant toute logique, les esprits de la machine ont refusé catégoriquement de les analyser plus en détail. Seul l'envoi d'une équipe au sol nous permettra d'en apprendre davantage. »

languages.text: “俄歇矩阵在扫描其中某个世界时，采集到了某个地质异常点的数据，但无法进行全面调查。根据报告，那个异常点类似于某种……无底虫洞。我无法提供更多细节，因为采集的数据完全没有逻辑可言，俄歇矩阵的机魂已经被激怒了，拒绝进一步处理。或许我们可以派遣探险队前往该异常点，了解更多信息。”
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

traits.locale_text: “俄歇矩阵在扫描其中某个世界时，采集到了某个地质异常点的数据，但无法进行全面调查。根据报告，那个异常点类似于某种……无底虫洞。我无法提供更多细节，因为采集的数据完全没有逻辑可言，俄歇矩阵的机魂已经被激怒了，拒绝进一步处理。或许我们可以派遣探险队前往该异常点，了解更多信息。”

languages.text: "Beim Scan einer der Welten haben die Auguren Daten einer geologischen Anomalie gesammelt, die sich nicht vollständig erforschen ließ. Den Berichten zufolge ähnelt das Objekt einem ... bodenlosen Wurmloch. Weitere Details kann ich nicht liefern. Die Maschinengeister der Auguren sind zornig geworden, weil in den gesammelten Daten keinerlei Logik zu finden war. Sie haben sich geweigert, sie weiter zu verarbeiten. Vielleicht können wir mehr herausfinden, indem wir ein Außenteam zu der Anomalie schicken."
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Scan einer der Welten haben die Auguren Daten einer geologischen Anomalie gesammelt, die sich nicht vollständig erforschen ließ. Den Berichten zufolge ähnelt das Objekt einem ... bodenlosen Wurmloch. Weitere Details kann ich nicht liefern. Die Maschinengeister der Auguren sind zornig geworden, weil in den gesammelten Daten keinerlei Logik zu finden war. Sie haben sich geweigert, sie weiter zu verarbeiten. Vielleicht können wir mehr herausfinden, indem wir ein Außenteam zu der Anomalie schicken."

languages.text: «Al escanear uno de los mundos, los augures han recogido los datos de una anomalía geológica que no se ha podido investigar al completo. Según los informes, la estructura se parece a... un agujero de gusano sin fondo. No puedo proporcionarle más detalles, pues los espíritus máquina de los augures se enfurecieron al no encontrarle la lógica a los datos recabados, y se negaron a seguir procesándolos. Quizá descubramos más detalles sobre esta anomalía si enviamos un equipo a analizarla».
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

traits.locale_text: «Al escanear uno de los mundos, los augures han recogido los datos de una anomalía geológica que no se ha podido investigar al completo. Según los informes, la estructura se parece a... un agujero de gusano sin fondo. No puedo proporcionarle más detalles, pues los espíritus máquina de los augures se enfurecieron al no encontrarle la lógica a los datos recabados, y se negaron a seguir procesándolos. Quizá descubramos más detalles sobre esta anomalía si enviamos un equipo a analizarla».

languages.text: 「惑星の一部をスキャンしたところ、スキャナーがとある地質異常のデータを収集しましたが、完全には調査できませんでした。報告によると、対象は…まるで底なしのワームホールです。スキャナーの機械精霊が、取得したデータは理論が通らないと腹を立て、これ以上のデータ処理を拒否したので、さらに深く情報を提供することはできません。この異常がある場所に部隊を派遣すれば、さらに情報が得られるのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星の一部をスキャンしたところ、スキャナーがとある地質異常のデータを収集しましたが、完全には調査できませんでした。報告によると、対象は…まるで底なしのワームホールです。スキャナーの機械精霊が、取得したデータは理論が通らないと腹を立て、これ以上のデータ処理を拒否したので、さらに深く情報を提供することはできません。この異常がある場所に部隊を派遣すれば、さらに情報が得られるのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: "Alametler, dünyalardan birini tararken üzerinde tam olarak inceleme yapılamayan, jeolojik bir anomaliye dair veriler elde etti. Raporlara göre bu nesne... Dipsiz bir solucan deliğini andırıyormuş. Alametlerin makine ruhları, elde edilen veride mantık bulunmaması sebebiyle öfkeli ve daha fazla işlem yapmayı reddediyorlar. Bu sebeple sizinle daha fazla detay paylaşamıyorum. Belki de anomaliye bir keşif ekibi gönderirsek daha fazlasını öğrenebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "When scanning one of the worlds, the augurs have gathered data from a certain geological anomaly that could not be fully investigated. According to the reports, the object resembles a... bottomless wormhole. I cannot provide any more details as the augurs' machine spirits became enraged due to the absence of logic in the acquired data and refused to process it further. Perhaps we can learn more by sending an away team to the anomaly."
